---
name: User Story
about: Describe a user story
title: "[Story] "
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

**As a** [type of user]  
**I need** [some goal]  
**So that** [some reason]  

### Acceptance Criteria

**Given** [context or starting point]  
**When** [an action is taken]  
**Then** [the expected result]

### Story Points: 
[1, 2, 3, 5, 8]
